name: Wangechi Mutu
education: United World College of the Atlantic, Cooper Union, Yale University
works: A Fake Jewel in the Crown (2007),, Chorus Line (2008),, Suspended Playtime (2008)
summary: Wangechi Mutu (born 22 June 1972) is an artist who lives and works in Brooklyn, New York. Through a variety of media including painting collage, sculpture, performance and video, Wangechi Mutu explores questions of self-image, gender constructs, cultural trauma and environmental destruction.
